flags.alt: The flag of New Zealand has a dark blue field with the flag of the United Kingdom — the Union Jack — in the canton and a representation of the Southern Cross constellation, made up of four five-pointed white-edged red stars, on the fly side of the field.

The flag of Solomon Islands features a thin yellow diagonal band that extends from the lower hoist-side corner to the upper fly-side corner of the field. Above and beneath this band are a blue and green triangle respectively. Five white five-pointed stars arranged in an X shape are situated on the hoist side of the upper blue triangle.

jpn.common: ココス（キーリング）諸島

flags.alt: The flag of Palau has a light blue field with a large golden-yellow circle that is offset slightly towards the hoist side of center.
The flag of Micronesia has a light blue field, at the center of which are four five-pointed white stars arranged in the shape of a diamond.

cym.official: Territory of the Wallis and Futuna Islands

fra.official: Territoire des îles Wallis et Futuna

ita.official: Territorio delle Isole Wallis e Futuna

jpn.official: ウォリス·フツナ諸島の領土

nld.official: Grondgebied van de Wallis en Futuna

por.official: Território das Ilhas Wallis e Futuna

spa.official: Territorio de las Islas Wallis y Futuna

urd.official: سر زمینِ والس و فتونہ جزائر

flags.alt: The flag of Australia has a dark blue field. It features the flag of the United Kingdom — the Union Jack — in the canton, beneath which is a large white seven-pointed star. A representation of the Southern Cross constellation, made up of one small five-pointed and four larger seven-pointed white stars, is situated on the fly side of the field.

jpn.official: ノーフォーク島の領土

cym.official: Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands

fra.official: Commonwealth des îles Mariannes du Nord

por.official: Comunidade das Ilhas Marianas do Norte

spa.official: Mancomunidad de las Islas Marianas del Norte

flags.alt: The flag of Nauru has a dark blue field with a thin yellow horizontal band across the center and a large white twelve-pointed star beneath the horizontal band on the hoist side of the field.
The flag of Samoa has a red field. A blue rectangle, bearing a representation of the Southern Cross made up of five large and one smaller five-pointed white stars, is superimposed in the canton.

The flag of Kiribati is divided into two halves. While the upper half has a red field, at the center of which is a yellow frigate bird flying over the top half of a rising yellow sun with seventeen visible rays, the lower half is composed of six horizontal wavy bands of white alternating with blue to depict the ocean.

cym.official: Independent and Sovereign Republic of Kiribati

ita.official: Repubblica indipendente e sovrano di Kiribati

jpn.official: キリバスの独立と主権共和国

por.official: Independente e soberano República de Kiribati

spa.official: República Independiente y Soberano de Kiribati

flags.alt: The flag of Marshall Islands has a blue field with two broadening adjacent diagonal bands of orange and white that extend from the lower hoist-side corner to the upper fly-side corner of the field. A large white star with twenty-four rays — four large rays at the cardinal points and twenty smaller rays — is situated in the upper hoist-side corner above the diagonal bands.

jpn.official: マーシャル諸島共和国

flags.alt: The flag of Vanuatu is composed of two equal horizontal bands of red and green, with a black isosceles triangle superimposed on the hoist side of the field. This triangle has its base on the hoist end, spans about two-fifth the width of the field and is enclosed on its sides by the arms of a thin black-edged yellow horizontally oriented Y-shaped band which extends along the boundary of the red and green bands to the fly end of the field. A yellow boar's tusk encircling two yellow crossed namele leaves is centered in the triangle.

bre.official: Inizi Pitcairn, Henderson, Ducie hag Oeno

est.official: Pitcairni, Hendersoni, Ducie ja Oeno saar

jpn.official: 島のピトケアングループ

pol.official: Wyspy Pitcairn, Henderson, Ducie i Oeno

srp.official: Острва Питкерн, Хендерсон, Дуци и Оин

tur.official: Pitcairn, Henderson, Ducie ve Oeno Adaları

flags.alt: The flag of Tonga has a red field. A white rectangle bearing a red Greek cross is superimposed in the canton.
The flag of Fiji has a light blue field. It features the flag of the United Kingdom — the Union Jack — in the canton and the shield of the national coat of arms centered in the fly half.

The flag of Tuvalu has a light blue field with the flag of the United Kingdom — the Union Jack — in the canton. A representation of the country's nine Islands using nine five-pointed yellow stars is situated in the fly half of the field.

spa.official: Territorio de la Isla de Navidad

flags.alt: The flag of Papua New Guinea is divided diagonally, from the upper hoist-side corner to the lower fly-side corner, into a lower black and an upper red triangle. On the hoist side of the lower black triangle is a representation of the Southern Cross constellation made up of one small and four larger five-pointed white stars. A golden Raggiana bird-of-paradise is situated on the fly side of the upper red triangle.

cym.official: Independent State of Papua New Guinea

ita.official: Stato indipendente di Papua Nuova Guinea

jpn.official: パプアニューギニア独立国

por.official: Estado Independente da Papua Nova Guiné

spa.official: Estado Independiente de Papúa Nueva Guinea

swe.official: Den oberoende staten Papua Nya Guinea

jpn.official: フランス領ポリネシア
jpn.common: フランス領ポリネシア
